akn:section.akn:heading: Restriction on reemployment after conviction of certain crimes

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3113. Restriction on reemployment after conviction of certain crimes An employee shall be separated from service and barred from reemployment in the Federal service, if—(1) the employee is convicted of a violation of section 201(b) of title 18; and
(2) such violation related to conduct prohibited under section 1010(a) of the Controlled Substances Import and Export Act (21 U.S.C. 960(a)).
(Added Pub. L. 105–61, title VI, § 638(a), Oct. 10, 1997, 111 Stat. 1316.)
